title: Proef/oefen tentamen 11 November 2016, vragen en antwoorden - Biomedical Sciences Exam Infectious - Studeersnel
description: Deel gratis samenvattingen, college-aantekeningen, oefenmateriaal, antwoorden en meer!
cleaned_text: Dit is een Premium document. Sommige documenten op Studeersnel zijn deelden 50 documenten in dit vak Dit is een preview Wil je onbeperkt toegang? Word Premium al Premium? Biomedical Sciences Exam Infectious Agents and Immunity November 11th 2016 This exam consists of nine questions and a total of ten points can be scored. For the first eight questions the maximal score is one point; the question on electives you can score two points. You have 3 hours to complete the exam. Success, also on behalf of the tutors of this course. Peter Name: Question 1: Immune response a. Which classes of effector T cells responses belong to successful immune responses to pathogens and which ones cause pathological conditions in inflammatory diseases? (0.2 point) in both cases Th1, Th2 and Th17 cells. CD8 T cells is also correct. b. How can you recognize or distinguish the different effector T cells? Mention one example for each type of effector Th cell. (0.2 point) Based on cytokine production or transcription factor expression. Th1 cells express Tbet and produce IFNg, Th2 cells express GATA-3 and produce IL-4, IL-5 is deze pagina onscherp? Dit is een Premium document. Word Premium om het volledige document te kunnen lezen.
